text: Félix Suárez (6 December 1950 - 3 September 2020) was a Spanish racing cyclist. He competed in the sprint event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Cistérniga, Spain. Suárez Colomo died on 3 September 2020 at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Olympians for Spain
title: Félix Suárez Colomo
